game.title: Save the Princess
game.objective: Rescue the princess from the evil wizard
game.description: The princess has been kidnapped by an evil wizard and is being held captive in his castle. You must embark on a dangerous quest to save her.
game.reward: The gratitude of the kingdom and a bag of gold

tasks.objective: Collect the key to the castle
tasks.description: The wizard has hidden the key somewhere in the enchanted forest. You must search for it and retrieve it.

tasks.objective: Defeat the guardian of the castle
tasks.description: There is a fearsome creature guarding the entrance to the castle. You must defeat it in order to gain access.
Navigate through the castle and find the cell where the princess is being held captive. Set her free and make sure she is safe.
